quest.name: Breaking and Delivering
journal: Much like her brother, Alisaie also loves it when a plan comes together.
objectives: Follow Alisaie to the Isle of Zekki.
Seek out and slay Red Kojin near the Dive.
Seek out and slay Red Kojin elsewhere on the Isle of Zekki.

dialogue.name: LYSE
dialogue.text: This has to work. I know it! I just hope Gosetsu and the others are all right...

dialogue.name: BUNCHIN
dialogue.text: Beneath the waters to the west of Sui–no–Sato lies a cave that will lead you to the Isle of Zekki. May the kami watch over and keep you.

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: I don't know about you two, but I'm as ready as I'll ever be.

dialogue.name: LYSE
dialogue.text: Me too. Let's do this!

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: Right. Right. Naught left to say, then...

dialogue.name: Q1
dialogue.text: What will you say?

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: To the Isle of Zekki!

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: You nervous?

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: R-Right! Let's go and find that cave!

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: Me? Nervous? Come now. I mean, it's not as though I haven't risked my life in ridiculous ways before.

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: Well, maybe I am a little bit... Hm. Strangest thing, that. Completely out of character, even. Anyway, let's go!

dialogue.name: LYSE
dialogue.text: I hope you didn't waste too much energy swimming here. Once the fighting starts, I doubt we'll have a moment to rest.

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: Assuming this is the right cave, it should lead us straight into the heart of the Isle of Zekki...

dialogue.name: LYSE
dialogue.text: Have you got a plan for once we get to the isle?

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: Hmm... How about two of us get the guards' attention while the third heads straight for the vault?

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: Afterwards, the other two join them there, and together we make a stand. With our numbers, it's not feasible to do anything more complicated, I think.

dialogue.name: LYSE
dialogue.text: Fine by me. I like simple plans. I'll be one of the decoys, then.

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: You read my mind. I also had a mind to ask Forename to be one, given herhis peerless martial prowess.

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: Then it's settled. You two will make your way through the stronghold, creating as much chaos as possible. You know, have some fun.

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: Meanwhile, I will attempt to locate the vault and gain entry with the ceremonial knife. When I am inside, I will contact you via linkpearl.

dialogue.name: LYSE
dialogue.text: Right! Come on, Forename! We've got work to do!

dialogue.name: BALLOON
dialogue.text: Intruders!? Here!?

dialogue.name: BALLOON
dialogue.text: Thieves, thieves!

dialogue.name: BALLOON
dialogue.text: Seize them!

dialogue.name: BALLOON
dialogue.text: How did they get here!?

dialogue.name: LYSE
dialogue.text: You're a sight for sore eyes! I hope Alisaie's all right too...

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: (-Alisaie-)Forename, Lyse, can you hear me? I've found the vault!

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: (-Alisaie-)Head northwest. There's a passage leading deeper within. Hurry!

dialogue.name: LYSE
dialogue.text: Come on, you Red bastards! Is that the best you can do!?

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: There you are! The entrance is straight ahead.

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: Good timing, I might add. It sounds like the whole garrison is headed straight for us...

dialogue.name: LYSE
dialogue.text: We should, um...we should definitely talk strategy before we do anything else!

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: <pant> <pant> That...that was not part of the plan! A Kojin primal was most definitely not part of the plan!

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: ...Though I am sure there is a perfectly logical explanation involving the aether stored in the treasures and the religious fervor with which the Kojin guard them. Or something. <sigh> A pity Alphinaud isn't here to provide it.

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: And just when I thought our fortunes had changed. I swear, if Soroban and his people knew this might happen...

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: ...No, somehow I doubt that. Even the Red seemed surprised by what happened.

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: All rises and falls at the whim of capricious fortune, does it? Then the same goes for him. We have to defeat that primal!
